message.content:
cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.HC, cs.CY, cs.SI 

This paper discusses the evaluation of recommendation algorithms, which falls under the category of machine learning (cs.LG). It also touches on information retrieval (cs.IR) as it discusses how to present items to users based on their wants or needs. The paper also mentions the importance of user experience (cs.HC) and the potential ethical concerns (cs.CY) with recommendation systems. Finally, the paper discusses the implementation of a MAB solution, which falls under the category of artificial intelligence (cs.SI).
